text: Yoh masa Tuhan Neukheun bak Isa Bah Lon cok gata tawoe bak Allah Bah keunoe bak Lon Lonpeuek gata Lon peugleh gata bak kaphe jadah Lon peujeut soe-soe nyang ikot gata Leubeh mulia nibak sijadah Leubeh manyang lom di ateuh kaphe Sampoe ‘an page kiamat sudah ‘Oh lheuh nyan tawoe bandum ubak Lon Sinan Lon hukom beuna ngon salah Peue nyang barokon tapeudong dawa Uroe nyan nyata hana meuilah
